content:
"""
I see the issue - we need to move closer to place the inserter. Let's create a proper sequence:
"""

# First move to the drill location
move_to(Position(19.0, -17.0))
print("Moved to drill location")

# Get our drill reference
drill = get_entities({Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill})[0]
drop_pos = drill.drop_position
print(f"Drill drop position: {drop_pos}")

# Check if we have iron ore nearby
iron_pos = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
if iron_pos:
    print(f"Found iron ore at {iron_pos}")
    # Move drill to iron ore if needed
    if drill.status == EntityStatus.NO_MINABLE_RESOURCES:
        pickup_entity(Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill, drill.position)
        move_to(iron_pos)
        drill = place_entity(
            Prototype.BurnerMiningDrill,
            position=iron_pos,
            direction=Direction.RIGHT
        )
        print(f"Moved drill to iron ore at {drill.position}")

# Add fuel to drill
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, drill, quantity=5)
print("Added fuel to drill")

# Now place inserter next to drill's output
inserter_pos = Position(x=drill.drop_position.x + 1, y=drill.drop_position.y)
inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=inserter_pos
)
print(f"Placed inserter at {inserter.position}")

# Add fuel to inserter
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, inserter, quantity=1)
print("Added fuel to inserter")

# Check nearby furnaces
furnaces = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})
print(f"Found {len(furnaces)} furnaces nearby")

# Add fuel to closest furnace
if furnaces:
    closest_furnace = furnaces[0]
    insert_item(Prototype.Coal, closest_furnace, quantity=5)
    print(f"Added fuel to furnace at {closest_furnace.position}")

# Wait for system to work
print("Waiting for automation to start...")
sleep(10)

# Check final status
print("\nFinal status:")
print(f"Drill status: {drill.status}")
print(f"Inserter status: {inserter.status}")
if furnaces:
    print(f"Furnace inventory: {inspect_inventory(closest_furnace)}")
